name: MLP Name Generator
description: Unleash your inner Brony! Create the perfect My Little Pony name with our magical generator. Sparkle on!
introduction: Ever dreamt of galloping through Equestria with a name as unique as your cutie mark? Well, hold your horses! Our MLP Name Generator is here to transform you into the pony of your dreams. Whether you're after a name that's sweet, sassy, or simply sensational, we've got you covered. Get ready to discover your pony persona!
howToUse: First, take a deep breath and channel your inner pony. Believe in the magic!
Click the 'Generate' button. Like, really click it. Don't just stare at it.
Behold! A magnificent MLP name will appear. If it doesn't make you neigh with delight, try again!
Share your fabulous new name with all your Brony friends! Let the magic spread!
Optional: Write fanfiction. Draw fanart. Live the pony life!

faqs.question: Is this generator actually magical?
faqs.answer: While we can't guarantee actual magic (we're still working on that!), the names it generates are pretty darn enchanting. Think of it as magic-adjacent.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my My Little Pony OC?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! That's what it's for! Go forth and create the most amazing pony OC the world has ever seen!

faqs.question: What if I don't like the name it gives me?
faqs.answer: No worries! Just hit that 'Generate' button again! There are countless pony names waiting to be discovered. Keep going until you find the one that makes your heart sing (or neigh).

faqs.question: Are the names generated based on existing MLP characters?
faqs.answer: While we drew inspiration from the world of Equestria, the names are mostly generated using a combination of prefixes and suffixes to create something new and unique. So, your pony will be one-of-a-kind!

faqs.question: Can I use this generator for other things besides My Little Pony?
faqs.answer: Well, technically, yes. But why would you want to? Embrace the pony! But seriously, you can use it for inspiration for any fantasy character name you like.

faqs.question: Is this generator kid-friendly?
faqs.answer: Yes! All the names generated are appropriate for all ages. So, let your little Bronies and Pegasisters have a blast!
